channel.title: Projects on Léon Fievet - Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Léon Fievet - Portfolio

item.title: SkyFuel - Drone Battery Management App
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: SkyFuel is an Android application dedicated to the efficient management of drone batteries, allowing pilots and operators to maintain their batteries in good condition and optimize their lifespan.

item.title: RaTouf - Chiroptera Data Analysis
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: RaTouf is a specialized application for integrating and analyzing data from bat ultrasonic recordings to optimize validation and transmission processes to ECO-MED’s SIN.

item.title: ECO-carpooling - Field Trip Optimization
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: ECO-carpooling - Field Trip Optimization # Smart carpooling application developed to optimize ECO-MED collaborators’ trips to intervention sites, reduce carbon footprint and foster collaboration between teams.

item.title: ECO-MED Application Hub
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: ECO-MED Application Hub is a complete application ecosystem designed to digitalize and optimize business processes of an environmental consulting firm specialized in environmental expertise.

item.title: PetalPatrol - Botanical Inventory Management
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: PetalPatrol is a specialized application for managing and analyzing floristic inventory data to optimize botanical studies and facilitate field data collection of plant observations.

item.title: YGGAME CTF Platform - Capture The Flag
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: YGGAME CTF Platform is an ambitious university project creating a complete Capture The Flag platform for the YGGAME association, integrating various cybersecurity challenges and a robust infrastructure based on Docker and CTFd.

item.title: BlackArsenal - PHP MVC E-commerce Site
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: BlackArsenal is a university e-commerce project developed in PHP with MVC architecture, specializing in fictional video game weapon sales to demonstrate back-end web development skills.
